properties.address: Dorset County Council, Beaminster, Dorset DT8 3EF
properties.description: Space open to all. Cuppa and Company event: every Tuesday 10am - 12 noon
properties.title: Beaminster Library

properties.description: We are open Monday 12-6pm, Tuesday 10-1pm, Wednesday 10-1pm, Thursday 2-5pm, Saturday 10-1pm We welcome anyone to come and enjoy our warm spaces. Find a quiet corner to work, study or read. Or join in with one of our many free activities for all ages to create something, learn something, write something, read with a group, play games or just have a drink, chat and make connections with others at our Coffee companions sessions. Computer use is free. What's on in Dorset libraries - https://www.dorsetcouncil.gov.uk/whats-on-in-dorset-libraries
properties.title: Beaminster Library

properties.address: St Mary's Church, Beaminster, Dorset DT8 3BA
properties.description: Open Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays from 10.00 am-4.00 pm. Large open space with seating and a children's area with toys. On Wednesdays a service at 10 followed by a community drop in with refreshments from 11.00 to 12.30 pm
properties.title: Church

properties.description: Old church building - running a community day for people to come to where they can chat, do activities or sit quietly with a hot drink.
properties.title: Mind in Somerset

properties.address: Bible Christian Chapel, Crewkerne, Somerset TA18 7QX
properties.description: The space is open to all, you don’t have to buy anything just come in and enjoy a chat or a game. Open on Wednesday and Friday 10am -12:30
properties.title: Oasis coffee shop

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 6th November 2024** Our warm welcome awaits you in our cosy, accessible care home in Yeovil. Come in and get warm, have a cuppa, a chat or just some time to reflect. We're open from Wednesday 6 November and every Wednesday 2pm until 3pm, you're welcome.
properties.title: Sherborne House Care Home

properties.address: St. Peters Community Centre, Yeovil, Somerset BA21 3DY
properties.description: ALWAYS OPEN INCLUDING WARM HUB THROUGHOUT THE WINTER MONTHS! Here to provide a community warm hub, all welcome. Catering for ALL. Daily papers, puzzles,magazines, a lounge area, a dining area, childrens play space, library all free to use. We also run a food hub within the cafe area in the community centre. the lunches are cooked fresh everyday made to order, and free! Monday to Thursday food served 12.15 - 1,15pm. Hot drinks available from 9.30am until 2.30pm daily. DONATION BASED HOT MEALS.
properties.title: St Peter's Community Centre, Westfield

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th November 2023** All are welcome for Tea, Coffee, Biscuits, Soup, Roll & Cheese.
properties.title: Warm Space

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Yeovil Library
